name: Plagueheart Leggings
tooltip:
Plagueheart LeggingsLevel 60

Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Plagueheart Leggings if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Leggings, 20 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 4 Mooncloth and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Leggings
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 20
- Mooncloth x 4
- Nexus Crystal x 2
